patient

Class PatientFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • patient.PatientFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PatientFileIN

    public class PatientFile
extends java.lang.Object
implements PatientFileIN
    This class represents the patient file of a patient.

      • addXRay

        public void addXRay(HospitalDate d)
        This method must be called if an XRrayScan is ordered for this patient. It is needed to keep track of the amount of xrays a patient has had in the past year.
        Parameters:
        d - The date on which the XRay is scheduled.

      • amountOfXraysThisYear

        public int amountOfXraysThisYear(HospitalDate hospitalDate)
        Parameters:
        curDate - The current system time.
        Returns:
        The amount of xrays this patient has had in the last year.
